TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract TimeZones implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._TimeZones

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 此集合是只读的，并用于枚举 Microsoft Windows 和 Outlook 所支持的时区。

span.span: This collection is read-only, and serves the purpose of enumerating time zones supported by Microsoft Windows and thus Outlook.

para.span: 其值是通过属性可访问和基于 Windows 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones 中存储的数据。

span.span: Its value is accessible through the property and is based on the data stored in the Windows registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones.
